lore: Armed with the power of Runeterra's gales, Janna is a mysterious, elemental wind spirit who protects the dispossessed of Zaun. Some believe she was brought into existence by the pleas of Runeterra's sailors who prayed for fair winds as they navigated treacherous waters and braved rough tempests. Her favor and protection has since been called into the depths of Zaun, where Janna has become a beacon of hope to those in need. No one knows where or when she will appear, but more often than not, she's come to help.
title: the Storm's Fury
blurb: Armed with the power of Runeterra's gales, Janna is a mysterious, elemental wind spirit who protects the dispossessed of Zaun. Some believe she was brought into existence by the pleas of Runeterra's sailors who prayed for fair winds as they navigated...
allytips: Eye of the Storm can be used on allied turrets.
Quickly firing a Howling Gale without the charge up can be used to heavily disable the other team.
Timing Janna's ultimate can push enemies away from a wounded ally or even separate enemies.

passive.name: Tailwind
passive.description:
Janna passively gains 8% Movement Speed, and nearby allied champions gain this bonus when moving toward her.

Additionally, Janna's basic attacks cause additional magic damage based on her bonus Movement Speed.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Janna passively gains 8% Movement Speed, and nearby allied champions gain this bonus when moving toward her. Additionally, Janna's basic attacks cause additional magic damage based on her bonus Movement Speed.

enemytips: Save an interrupt ability for when Janna uses her ultimate.
Listen for the charge up sound on Howling Gale in case Janna is trying to hit you with it from off screen or from brush.
Janna's at her strongest when buffing another ally. If you can harass her ally, it will weaken her ability to fight you.
name: Janna

spells.name: Howling Gale
spells.description: By creating a localized change in pressure and temperature, Janna is able to create a small storm that grows in size with time. She can activate the spell again to release the storm. On release this storm will fly towards the direction it was cast in, dealing damage and knocking away any enemies in its path.
spells.sanitizedDescription: By creating a localized change in pressure and temperature, Janna is able to create a small storm that grows in size with time. She can activate the spell again to release the storm. On release this storm will fly towards the direction it was cast in, dealing damage and knocking away any enemies in its path.
spells.tooltip:
Summons a whirlwind, which deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies in its path and knocks them into the air for {{ e4 }} seconds.

The whirlwind can be charged up to {{ e6 }} seconds. For each second charged, it:
  • Deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) bonus damage
    Knocks up for an additional {{ e5 }} seconds
    Travels {{ e3 }}% further

    • Howling Gale always reaches its destination in {{ e8 }} seconds.

    Activate again to release the whirlwind early.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Summons a whirlwind, which deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies in its path and knocks them into the air for {{ e4 }} seconds. The whirlwind can be charged up to {{ e6 }} seconds. For each second charged, it: Deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) bonus damage Knocks up for an additional {{ e5 }} seconds Travels {{ e3 }}% further Howling Gale always reaches its destination in {{ e8 }} seconds. Activate again to release the whirlwind early.

spells.name: Zephyr
spells.description: Janna summons an air elemental that passively increases her Movement Speed and enables her to pass through units. She may also activate this ability to deal damage and slow an enemy's Movement Speed. The passive is lost while this ability is on cooldown.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Janna summons an air elemental that passively increases her Movement Speed and enables her to pass through units. She may also activate this ability to deal damage and slow an enemy's Movement Speed. The passive is lost while this ability is on cooldown.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: While Zephyr is not on cooldown, Janna gains {{ e1 }}% (+{{ f1 }}%) Movement Speed and can move through units.

Active: Deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f3 }}) magic damage to an enemy and slows their Movement Speed by {{ e3 }}% (+{{ f2 }}%) for {{ e4 }} seconds.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Passive: While Zephyr is not on cooldown, Janna gains {{ e1 }}% (+{{ f1 }}%) Movement Speed and can move through units. Active: Deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f3 }}) magic damage to an enemy and slows their Movement Speed by {{ e3 }}% (+{{ f2 }}%) for {{ e4 }} seconds.

spells.name: Eye Of The Storm
spells.description: Janna conjures a defensive gale that shields an ally champion or turret from incoming damage and increases their Attack Damage.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Janna conjures a defensive gale that shields an ally champion or turret from incoming damage and increases their Attack Damage.
spells.tooltip: Shields an allied Champion or turret for {{ e3 }} seconds. The shield absorbs up to {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage and grants {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) Attack Damage until it breaks.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Shields an allied Champion or turret for {{ e3 }} seconds. The shield absorbs up to {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage and grants {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) Attack Damage until it breaks.

spells.name: Monsoon
spells.description: Janna surrounds herself in a magical storm, throwing enemies back. After the storm has settled, soothing winds heal nearby allies while the ability is active.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Janna surrounds herself in a magical storm, throwing enemies back. After the storm has settled, soothing winds heal nearby allies while the ability is active.
spells.tooltip: Summons forth the might of the wind to knock surrounding enemies back and restores {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Health to nearby allies each second for {{ e3 }} seconds.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Summons forth the might of the wind to knock surrounding enemies back and restores {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Health to nearby allies each second for {{ e3 }} seconds.
